PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
_ZclTunnelClosureNotificationPayload_t Struct Reference

#include <zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h>

Data Fields

uint16_t tunnelId

Detailed Description

TunnelClosureNotification is sent by the server to indicate that a tunnel has been closed due to expiration of a CloseTunnelTimeout. See ZSE Profile Spec. r17, Figure D.49.

Definition at line 747 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint16_t _ZclTunnelClosureNotificationPayload_t::tunnelId

The parameter must correspond to a tunnel that was still active and maintained by the server. See ZSE Profile Specification r17, Figure D.49.
